faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about WaveSpeed AI

items.title: What types of objects can WaveSpeed remove?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI can remove a wide variety of unwanted elements including people, text, watermarks, logos, shadows, reflections, and various objects like trash cans, power lines, or photobombers. The AI is trained to recognize and intelligently replace these elements with appropriate background content.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed completely free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 free credits daily, allowing you to create hundreds of images. You can also earn additional credits through user surveys or daily challenges on our Discord server. For professional users with higher volume needs, we offer affordable subscription plans with additional features.

items.title: Can I use my generated content for commercial purposes?
items.description: Paid users with any subscription plan can use generated content for commercial purposes. Free-tier users can use generated content for personal projects but are restricted from commercial use. For specific licensing questions, please review our Terms of Service or contact our support team.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: WaveSpeed processes all images directly in your browser using WebAssembly and JavaScript. Your photos are never uploaded to our servers or stored anywhere. This ensures complete privacy and security for your images. Once you close the browser tab, all processing data is cleared.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the difference for yourself. No sign-up required.
